ul.li: cayenne-user - General discussion and support list.
cayenne-devel - a list for those who contribute to Cayenne.
You can also subscribe to Cayenne release announcements on Freshmeat.
Avoid crossposting the same message to more than one list.
Post to the list most appropriate for the topic of your message.

section.name: cayenne-user
section.p: cayenne-user is a mailing list for Cayenne users. It is the primary source of free Cayenne support. It is also a place for general discussion of Cayenne-related topics.
To subscribe send empty email to cayenne-user-subscribe@objectstyle.org.
To unsubscribe send empty email to cayenne-user-unsubscribe@objectstyle.org.
To post a message use the following address: cayenne-user@objectstyle.org.

section.name: cayenne-devel
section.p: cayenne-devel is a mailing list where Cayenne design issues are discussed. This includes current and future features, release schedules, and simply developer discussion of various Cayenne-related topics. It is a good idea for all Cayenne commiters to subscribe to this list. Others are welcomed to subscribe and participate if they are interested in the topics discussed here.
To subscribe send empty email to cayenne-devel-subscribe@objectstyle.org.
To unsubscribe send empty email to cayenne-devel-unsubscribe@objectstyle.org.
To post a message use the following address: cayenne-devel@objectstyle.org.

section.name: cayenne-cvs
section.p: cayenne-cvs is a mailing list that receives all of the Cayenne CVS commit messages. You can subscribe to this list to keep track of changes to the Cayenne CVS repository.
To subscribe send empty email to cayenne-cvs-subscribe@objectstyle.org.
To unsubscribe send empty email to cayenne-cvs-unsubscribe@objectstyle.org.
